docs.text: References Chair Chair __init__(self, espaldar, material, patas) special Constructor for chair. Parameters: espaldar ( Espaldar ) – (Espaldar) a espaldar for the chair. material ( Material ) – (Material) a material for the chair. patas ( List[str] ) – (List(str)) for the chair. Source code in chairs\chair.py def __init__(self, espaldar: Espaldar, material: Material, patas: List[str]) -> None: """Constructor for chair. Args: espaldar: (Espaldar) a espaldar for the chair. material: (Material) a material for the chair. patas: (List(str)) for the chair. """ self.espaldar = espaldar self.material = material self.patas = patas __len__(self) special Len of legs of the chair. Returns: int – int: amount of legs. Source code in chairs\chair.py def __len__(self) -> int: """Len of legs of the chair. Returns: int: amount of legs. """ return len(self.patas) __repr__(self) special Repr of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The representation of the material. Source code in chairs\chair.py def __repr__(self) -> str: """Repr of espaldar. Returns: str: The representation of the material. """ return f'Chair of material {self.material}' __str__(self) special String representation of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The name of the espaldar. Source code in chairs\chair.py def __str__(self) -> str: """String representation of espaldar. Returns: str: The name of the espaldar. """ return f'{self.material}'

docs.text: References Espaldar Implementation of Espaldar Class. Espaldar class that allows to create Espaldares. __init__(self, material, color='Black') special Constructor of the Espaldar Class. Parameters: material ( Material ) – (Material) a Material instance. color ( Optional[str] ) – (str, optional) a color for the espaldar. Defaults to Black. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __init__(self, material: Material, color: Optional[str] ='Black') -> None: """Constructor of the Espaldar Class. Args: material: (Material) a Material instance. color: (str, optional) a color for the espaldar. Defaults to Black. """ self.material = material self.color = color __repr__(self) special Repr of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The representation of the material. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __repr__(self) -> str: """Repr of espaldar. Returns: str: The representation of the material. """ return f'Espaldar of material {self.material} and color {self.color}' __str__(self) special String representation of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The name of the espaldar. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __str__(self) -> str: """String representation of espaldar. Returns: str: The name of the espaldar. """ return f'{self.material} - {self.color}'

docs.text: Constructor of the Espaldar Class. Parameters: material ( Material ) – (Material) a Material instance. color ( Optional[str] ) – (str, optional) a color for the espaldar. Defaults to Black. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __init__(self, material: Material, color: Optional[str] ='Black') -> None: """Constructor of the Espaldar Class. Args: material: (Material) a Material instance. color: (str, optional) a color for the espaldar. Defaults to Black. """ self.material = material self.color = color

docs.text: Repr of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The representation of the material. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __repr__(self) -> str: """Repr of espaldar. Returns: str: The representation of the material. """ return f'Espaldar of material {self.material} and color {self.color}'
docs.title: __repr__()

docs.text: String representation of espaldar. Returns: str – str: The name of the espaldar. Source code in chairs\espaldar.py def __str__(self) -> str: """String representation of espaldar. Returns: str: The name of the espaldar. """ return f'{self.material} - {self.color}'
